title: User Login Process
description: User login details such as login state, location, and type, as well as forgot username and password counts.

xdm:userCookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
xdm:userCookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

xdm:userCookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
xdm:userCookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

xdm:userForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
xdm:userForgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

xdm:userForgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
xdm:userForgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

xdm:userLogin.title: Visitor Login
xdm:userLogin.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

xdm:userLoginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
xdm:userLoginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

xdm:userLoginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
xdm:userLoginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

xdm:userLoginLocation.title: Login Page Location
xdm:userLoginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

xdm:userLoginKeychain.title: Keychain
xdm:userLoginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

xdm:userLoginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
xdm:userLoginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

xdm:userLoginStatus.title: Login Status
xdm:userLoginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

xdm:userLoginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
xdm:userLoginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

xdm:userLoginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
xdm:userLoginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

xdm:userLogout.title: Visitor Logout
xdm:userLogout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

xdm:userResetPassword.title: Reset Password
xdm:userResetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

xdm:userSessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
xdm:userSessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

xdm:userUpdate.title: Account Profile Update
xdm:userUpdate.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.
